component.name: ByteAgent
component.summary: Your AI Assistant for Everyday Computer Tasks

description.p: ByteAgent is an AI-powered desktop assistant like ChatGPT, but with hands. From organizing files and reading PDFs to running diagnostics and fixing scripts, ByteAgent can use built-in tools and commands to get real work done on your machine.

ul.li: 🧠 Smart Workspaces – Isolated environments for clean and safe execution
🔐 Secure Execution – Shell commands require user approval
🕵️ Total Privacy – No tracking; only license UUID and email
⚡ Realtime Access – Immediate interaction with files, tools, and the system
🌐 From Filesystem to Web – Analyze, organize, automate, and more

description.p: Initial release of ByteAgent on flatpak
